-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Session store based on clientsession
--   
@package wai-session-clientsession
@version 0.1

module Network.Wai.Session.ClientSession

-- | Session store that keeps all content in a <a>Serialize</a>d cookie
--   encrypted with <a>ClientSession</a>
--   
--   WARNING: This session is vulnerable to sidejacking, use with TLS for
--   security.
clientsessionStore :: (Serialize k, Serialize v, Eq k, MonadIO m) => Key -> SessionStore m k v
